name: Boot & Shoot
description:
do you remember when games were relegated to arcades?
where endless hours and rolls of quarters were spent honing reflexes
when everyone was trying to lock in and go on a masterful run
just to earn a coveted spot on the top 10 list

maybe not
but we do

boot & shoot is just that kind of game
a simple arena-style shooter with a unique movement mechanic, satisfying combat, a frenetic pace, and a high skill ceiling
packed with an assortment of upgrades to help handle the evolving difficulty
and a leaderboard

your only objective is high score
death is certain

you will
  • face overwhelming odds in a one-vs-many arena shooter
  • upgrade with powerups and perks by killing enemies with style
  • learn to mobilize yourself in a zero gravity environment with only shots and kicks
  • score big points by using their numbers against them to gain multiplier
  • earn standing in the global leaderboards
  • die and try again
